"Covered Code" means the Original Code, Modifications, the combination of Original Code and any

"Deploy" means to use, sublicense or distribute Covered Code other than for Your internal

"Modifications" mean any addition to, deletion from, and/or change to, the substance and/or

                    program statements that contains any part of Covered Code.

"Original Code" means (a) the Source Code of a program or other work as originally made available

"Personal Use" means use of Covered Code by an individual solely for his or her personal, private
                    and non-commercial purposes. An individual's use of Covered Code in his or her capacity as an
                    officer, employee, member, independent contractor or agent of a corporation, business or
                    organization (commercial or non-commercial) does not qualify as Personal Use.

"Source Code" means the human readable form of a program or other work that is suitable for
                    making modifications to it, including all modules it contains, plus any associated interface
                    definition files, scripts used to control compilation and installation of an executable
                    (object code).

"You" or "Your" means an individual or a legal entity exercising rights under this License. For

You must retain and reproduce a copy of this License with every copy of Source Code of Covered
                         Code and documentation You distribute, and You may not offer or impose any terms on such
                         Source Code that alter or restrict this License or the recipients' rights hereunder, except as

Whenever reasonably feasible you should include the copy of this License in a click-wrap format,

You may use, reproduce, display, perform, modify and Deploy Covered Code, provided that in each

You must satisfy all the conditions of Section 2.1 with respect to the Source Code of the Covered Code;

You must make Source Code of all Your Deployed Modifications publicly available under the terms

NO WARRANTY OR SUPPORT. The Covered Code may contain in whole or in part pre-release, untested,

Termination.
Termination. This License and the rights granted hereunder will terminate:

automatically without notice if You fail to comply with any term(s) of this License and fail to

immediately in the event of the circumstances described in Section 13.5(b); or

automatically without notice if You, at any time during the term of this License, commence an

Miscellaneous.

Waiver; Construction. Failure by Sybase or any Contributor to enforce any provision of this
